Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Be careful they try to add few extra charge without foundation to the invoice They made more mistake than a five star hotel could ever Never ask bed for your child This chain s other hotel is excellent for example in Milan but never again in London
Positive_Review: nice art deco rooms good location

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Positive_Review: Very expensive but totally worth it In a completely elevated class from the Marriott Grosvenor House that we stayed in afterwards but double the price Beautiful Deco decor Free local area taxi service using their Rolls Royce or Mercedes S class

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: No buffet breakfast option and breakfast was expensive but still beautiful and personal
Positive_Review: Amazing staff and the room was absolutely divine The decor and design is second to none It is exquisite Small and personal and in a beautiful location

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Lots of confusion at check in about adding SPG Gold status to reservation no gold benefits given many outlets in room not functioning repairs to room outlets not completed during stay as promised small room

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: welcome at reception was given another room that seen on the web managed to change it though tiny common space no lobby more like a b b than an hotel Rolls seem to be always away for service

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Couldn t find a taxi easily but thanks to Uber I could go where ever I want
Positive_Review: Handy was the smartest best thing I ever got from a property And the car is the best thing the staff were so helpful they got me dinner booking in awesome restaurants

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Positive_Review: We bought our 2 year old daughter they never said no in this hotel the service is surperb I ve stayed a many beautiful hotels 5star it one of my fav so far I will return for sure

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: The hotel charged us for a junior suit but in fact the room was smaller than standard The desk staff are extremely unprofessional They charged us twice as soon as we walked in the hotel They were all interested in money and that the residents pay first thing The breakfast in not buffet and RIDICULOUSLY expensive The manager was RUDE with no experienced how to treat a client He knew that they were ripping us off regarding extra charge but refused to refund but kept saying that they will upgrade us on our next visit Shamble and empty I paid for junior suit and it was in fact smaller that normal rooms I have stayed in Dorchester Oriental Mandarin Sanderson St martins lanes etc who charges same price but my lord what a difference in service This hotel is a rip off I will never ever stay there and would recommend to stay away

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Chick in with the attitude as they answer if you don t like your room which wasn t what I booked was smaller and I stayed few times before go and find another hotel which was not ready and have so bad smell New staff with so bad attitude like they pairs for your stay Never gone go back

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Not keen on the food and the temperature control is by the door and a hassle to control at night as I have to get out of bed to do it

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: The lobby is a bit small the bar as well is on the petite side
Positive_Review: Staff and the location The lady from reception did an amazing job of taking care of my request prior to arrival So we had time to get ready for the evening entertainment

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Positive_Review: The staff where amazing the location is perfect although in the middle of the city but it was quite The cigar bar within the hotel is also a great advantage

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: I should call housekeeping daily for the complementary bottles of water My room had a dead view and you cannot use the balcony
Positive_Review: Their cigar lounge is one of the best in London and the hotel food in general is good

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: It s very expinsive although the room is very small and there is no lobby I reserved there for one week but first day I changed my mind coz of the room size the hotel colidor so I ask them I want to checkout next they said it ok and will charge u only for one night and when I went to pay for it they force me to pay for two night and they said it was miss understanding they really cheat us

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Positive_Review: The junior suite was exceptional 24 hour butler service spacious bathroom with both bath and shower The bed was extremely comfortable The hotel itself is really well maintained and to a very high standard The staff were very friendly and most importantly very helpful The chauffeur driven rolls Royce was a nice touch to help us get to harrods for some afternoon tea and shopping Would highly recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Room was on the small side and breakfast was poor Not close enough to the shopping areas for us Smart TV wasn t very smart not even supporting screen mirroring
Positive_Review: The bed was great thick duvet Car service very useful even with a very limited range Free movies on demand

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Positive_Review: We love the decor atmosphere the friendly helpful staff and the car is a huge bonus We have stayed on previous occasions will definitely be back again

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: One of the staff who covered as a concierge from Christmas to the new year eve was rude and he just don t fit the place But the rest of the concierges staff was so professional
Positive_Review: Staff are so friendly it s just like a home

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Check in Even if the room was ready at 1pm we had to wait until 3pm official checking in time It would have been a nice touch to allow us to go to the room earlier
Positive_Review: Servizio cortesia camere e bagno favolosi

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Cigar patio made it popular with a certain type of people who are not my type Hyde park is very noisy
Positive_Review: Location is the best advantage Small is beautiful

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Positive_Review: All the staff I encountered during my stay were extremely kind and helpful they made the stay perfect Not far from the underground so getting to places is not an issue also Harrods is about a 10 minutes walk away The best however is that they have a free chauffeur service that gets you to places that are nearby in a Rolls Royce

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Mini bar wasn t complimentary and for room category we chose Junior suite we thought it should be Staff were pleasant enough but could have been a little less formal front of house
Positive_Review: Quiet peaceful great location extremely comfy beds and great bed linen veryclean Doorman housekeepers and porters were very friendly

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
Negative_Review: Would have liked more movies available
Positive_Review: Location is perfect very central Gorgeous comfy bed Wonderful bathroom with underfloor heating huge bath tub TV and fabulous shower Very friendly and helpful staff We were upgraded to a lovely room over looking the park that really was beautiful and very relaxing A sumptuous boutique hotel We will be back

Hotel_Name: The Wellesley Knightsbridge a Luxury Collection Hotel London
